mapper.update:
update om_publisher
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
verify_status = #{verifyStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
domain = #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
descn = #{descn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
revenue_sharing = #{revenueSharing,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
im_type = #{imType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
publisher_manager = #{publisherManager,jdbcType=INTEGER},
account_manager = #{accountManager,jdbcType=INTEGER},
token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
token_create_time = #{tokenCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
skype = #{skype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wechat_qq = #{wechatQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
facebook_account = #{facebookAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
owner_user_id = #{ownerUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
lastmodify = #{lastmodify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update om_publisher set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, verify_status = #{verifyStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, domain = #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, descn = #{descn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, revenue_sharing = #{revenueSharing,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, im_type = #{imType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, publisher_manager = #{publisherManager,jdbcType=INTEGER}, account_manager = #{accountManager,jdbcType=INTEGER}, token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, token_create_time = #{tokenCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, skype = #{skype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat_qq = #{wechatQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, facebook_account = #{facebookAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owner_user_id = #{ownerUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lastmodify = #{lastmodify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT om_publisher.id, om_publisher.name, om_publisher.nickname, om_publisher.status, om_publisher.verify_status, om_publisher.domain, om_publisher.descn, om_publisher.contacts, om_publisher.revenue_sharing, om_publisher.im_type, om_publisher.publisher_manager, om_publisher.account_manager, om_publisher.token, om_publisher.token_create_time, om_publisher.address, user.email, om_publisher.country, om_publisher.phone, om_publisher.skype, om_publisher.wechat_qq, om_publisher.facebook_account, om_publisher.owner_user_id, om_publisher.create_time, om_publisher.lastmodify FROM om_publisher LEFT JOIN um_user user ON om_publisher.owner_user_id = user.id WHERE user.status = 1
